			 and respects the right to bear arms found in the Second Amendment to the

There are

If the citizens
			 of the United States agree that in order to promote safe and responsible gun
			 ownership criminals and the mentally ill should be prohibited from possessing
			 firearms, it should be incumbent upon all citizens to ensure weapons are not
			 being transferred to such people.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To ensure that all individuals who should be prohibited
		  from buying a firearm are listed in the national instant criminal background
		  check system and require a background check for every firearm
		  sale.
